settings.text:
OS 2.0 Flexible sections everywhere: 20+ feature-rich sections that can be added, rearranged, and integrated into any page of your store.

Faceted product filtering: Let customers easily discover your products with filters for product availability, price, product type, vendor, and your product options.

Product 3D AR models: Add videos or 3D models to your product media on the product page.

Predictive search: We've added a new feature that's turned on by default search. Improve discoverability with fast, dynamic search results for products, pages and blog content.

Quick buy option: Allow customers to quickly and easily add items to their cart without navigating away from the page.

Multi Currency: Allow customer to easily change currency.

Cart drawer or popup notification: Allow customers to easily add items to their cart without leaving the page with drawer or modal.

Announcement bar: Highlight promotions and need-to-know updates about your store at the top of the page.

Scrolling bar: With the use of the scrolling bar, you can scroll the important announcements and promotional texts. The scrolling bar section in the sitar theme comes with various customizations.

Slideshow: Display high resolution images with adjustable height and custom time between slides.

Collection list: Give customers a high-level view of all your collections in an adjustable row so they can discover all your products.

Featured collection: Showcase a special collection or bestselling products in an adjustable grid.

Image banner: Present high-resolution images with adjustable height and addcustom text and link.

Featured product: Display a product page in a single section so customers can quickly add
products to their cart.

Multicolumn: Allows you to create a page with multiple columns such as 3, 4 or even 5 columns without having to use any complicated HTML. 

Video: Embed a video from YouTube or Vimeo to tell your story or provide an in-depth look at your products.

Sponsored product: Highlight a special collection or top-selling products in a customizable grid.

Logo list: Use this section to display multiple brand logos in the slider.

Testimonials: This section is used to collect feedback and reviews from happy customers. This section can be seen as a slider. You can add a maximum of nine slides that will display as a slideshow in this section.

Featured blog: Blogs are an excellent way to add a vital and personal touch to your store and keep customers coming back.

Rich text: Use this text area to share information about your brand with your customers.

Image with text: With a feature image, customize the text section to make this section suit your needs.

Multirow: Allows you to create a page with multiple rows without having to use any complicated HTML.

Collapsible content: Add a Frequently Asked Questions page with a dropdown list of Questions and Answers for customers to find what they need.

Newsletter: Provide a frontpage sign-up form for your newsletter to keep up engagement with your customers.

Contact form: Add a Contact form with a custom media grid and easy-to-use form for customers to get in touch.

Counter: This section is taken into use to showcase special products or collections with a countdown timer.

Text with icons: Use this section to display multiple brand logos in the slider.

Product videos: Product video fully supported.

Product Models / AR: Allow customer to add 3D model image.

Different media type: Customer can choose different media type like product stack, thumbnail carousel, thumbnail.

Product stockbar: Show stock countdown according to your product inventory.

Variant Images: Let customers see what colors are available for a product with either a solid color or a textured image. 

Variant picker: Allow customer to choose option like pills or dropdown.

Social media sharing: Customer can easily share product on any social media.

Dynamic checkout buttons: Let returning customers quickly checkout with their preferred payment method.

Store pickup display: Let customers know whether the product they want is available at your local store.

Image with text: With a feature image, customize the text section to make this section suit your needs.

Product reviews: Allow customer to add review of products.
